event.title: Talk: FreeYourAndroid - The right to install Free Software on any device

body.p: On December 11th at 18.00 hours, Erik Albers will give a speech about FSFE's FreeYourAndroid campaign at the Institut f√ºr Informatik, FU Berlin. The talk is organized by Spline Talks and is open for public at no charge. The talk, in German, will be held in Raum K60, Takustr. 9, 14195 Berlin.
